Mat

class pyrit.material.Mat(name: str, *props: MatProperty)

Bases: object

Class that represents a specific material.

Constructor of Mat

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the Mat.

  • *props (MatProperty) – A number of MatProperties, possibly empty.

Return type

None.

Methods

add_property

Adds a number of MatProperties to the Mat

delete_property

Deletes the MatProperty of prop_class from the Mat

get_property

Returns the MatProperty of the class specified in prop_class

has_original_property

Returns True if a MatProperty of prop_class is directly defined on this Mat, False if not

is_homogeneous

Returns if this Mat is homogeneous or not.

is_hysteretic

Returns if this Mat is hysteretic or not.

is_isotropic

Returns if this Mat is isotropic or not.

is_linear

Returns if this Mat is linear or not.

is_time_dependent

Returns if this Mat is time dependent or not.

update

Update a value in the MatProperties.

Attributes

name

property_converter

ID

Returns the ID of the Mat
__del__()

Delete the Mat

Return type

None.

property ID

Returns the ID of the Mat

Returns

ID of the Mat.

Return type

int

is_linear(prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None) → bool

Returns if this Mat is linear or not.

Parameters

prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, it is only checked if the property of this type is linear. If not given, all properties are considered.

Returns

linear

Return type

bool

is_homogeneous(prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None) → bool

Returns if this Mat is homogeneous or not.

Parameters

prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, it is only checked if the property of this type is homogeneous. If not given, all properties are considered.

Returns

homogeneous

Return type

bool

is_isotropic(prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None) → bool

Returns if this Mat is isotropic or not.

Parameters

prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, it is only checked if the property of this type is isotropic. If not given, all properties are considered.

Returns

isotropic

Return type

bool

is_time_dependent(prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None) → bool

Returns if this Mat is time dependent or not.

Parameters

prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, it is only checked if the property of this type is time dependent. If not given, all properties are considered.

Returns

isotropic

Return type

bool

is_hysteretic(prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None) → bool

Returns if this Mat is hysteretic or not.

Parameters

prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, it is only checked if the property of this type is hysteretic. If not given, all properties are considered.

Returns

hysteretic

Return type

bool

update(name: str, val: Any, *, prop_class: Optional[Type[MatProperty]] = None)

Update a value in the MatProperties.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the argument in the MatProperties to update.

  • val (Any) – The new value that is written on the MatProperties

  • prop_class (Type[MatProperty], optional) – If given, set the value only in the MatProperty of given type. If not given, set the value for all. Default is None

add_property(*props: MatProperty)

Adds a number of MatProperties to the Mat

Parameters

*props (MatProperty) – Properties of the Mat.

Raises

TypeError – When an object in props is no instance of MatProperty.

Return type

None.

has_original_property(prop_class) → bool

Returns True if a MatProperty of prop_class is directly defined on this Mat, False if not

Parameters

prop_class – Class to check

Returns

has_property

Return type

bool

get_property(prop_class) → Optional[Type[MatProperty]]

Returns the MatProperty of the class specified in prop_class

Parameters

prop_class (MatProperty) – The class which MatProperty should be returned

Returns

Object of class specified in prop_class.

Return type

MatProperty

delete_property(prop_class)

Deletes the MatProperty of prop_class from the Mat

Parameters

prop_class – The class wich object should be deleted.

Return type

None.
